com.kontakt.sdk.android.common.util

Class IBeaconPropertyValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kontakt.sdk.android.common.util.IBeaconPropertyValidator

  • public final class IBeaconPropertyValidator
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides checking methods for different properties of iBeacon devices.
    See Also:
    kontakt.io Beacon Datasheet - version 2.0

      • validateAdvertisingInterval

        public static void validateAdvertisingInterval(int beaconIntervalMillis)
        Validates Beacon advertising interval. The interval value should be within [20...10240] ms.
        Parameters:
        beaconIntervalMillis - the beacon interval millis
        See Also:
        kontakt.io Beacon Datasheet - version 2.0

      • validateBeaconPassword

        public static void validateBeaconPassword(java.lang.String beaconPassword,
                                          java.lang.String firmwareRevision)
        Validates Beacon password.
        The password should be 4-byte long (4 ASCII characters) for Beacons with firmware version lower than 4.0.
        The password should be 1 to 16 byte long (1 to 16 ASCII characters) for Beacons with firmware version 4.0 or higher
        Parameters:
        beaconPassword - the beacon password
        firmwareRevision - firmware revision
        See Also:
        kontakt.io Beacon Datasheet - version 2.0

      • validateBeaconMasterPassword

        public static void validateBeaconMasterPassword(java.lang.String masterPassword)
        Validates beacon master password. The master password should be 6-byte long (6 ASCII characters).
        Parameters:
        masterPassword - the master password
        See Also:
        kontakt.io Beacon Datasheet - version 2.0
